courses.name: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: Fundamental concepts in computer science including algorithms, programming basics, data representation, and problem-solving techniques using Python.

courses.name: Data Structures
courses.description: Advanced study of data structures including linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs with algorithm analysis.

courses.name: Calculus I
courses.description: Introduction to differential and integral calculus with applications to problems in science and engineering.

courses.name: Classical Mechanics
courses.description: Newtonian mechanics, conservation laws, oscillations, and gravitation with calculus-based problem solving.

courses.name: Academic Writing
courses.description: Development of academic writing skills with emphasis on critical reading, research, and composition.
